curam.core.impl.util

Class CuramDocToResultStruct

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.core.impl.util.CuramDocToResultStruct

  • public final class CuramDocToResultStruct
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to help convert a CuramDoc to a corresponding Curam struct.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object convert(CuramDocument document, java.lang.Object structObj, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dictionary)
      This method converts the supplied document to a Curam struct.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static java.lang.Object convert(CuramDocument document,
                                       java.lang.Object structObj,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dictionary)
        This method converts the supplied document to a Curam struct. If a field in the struct does not have a corresponding field in the document, it will not be set. Fields in the supplied struct that correspond to document fields must be either Strings, simple Java types such as long or boolean, curam types Date, DateTime or Money.
        Parameters:
        document - the document containing data to be converted to a struct
        structObj - the Curam struct that is to receive the data
        dictionary - a mapping from the field names as in the document and search index to the corresponding field in the supplied struct. This mapping allows for the reuse of existing Curam search result structs where their attribute names are different to the names of the fields of the Document/index. This mapping prevents the need to model yet another struct for GSS specific results.
        Returns:
        the structObj with fields filled in from the supplied document
